testsuite.test:
Verify Preconditions
Instructions: 1) Make sure all the preconditions listed are met. They will be required by upcoming tests. 2) Copy the content of the testsuite's zip-file's folder 'video' into the videos directory on the phone. (The exact name of the destination folder may vary on your device.) 3) Click 'GO' to start testing.
Expected behaviour: See green colored line on the device screen.

play 2x loop
Instructions: Click 'GO' to play video.
Expected behaviour: Did you see the video twice?

play 5x loop
Instructions: Click 'GO' to play video.
Expected behaviour: Did you see the video five times?

play pause and play again
Instructions: Click 'GO' to play video.
Expected behaviour: Did the video play, pause and play again?

setWindow Disassociate preview window setWindow null
Instructions: Follow the instructions on the screen.
Expected behaviour: Did the preview window disappear after about 5 seconds?

Protocol Test codec h263 from test video long h263 lq 3gp
Instructions: Click 'GO' to play video.
Expected behaviour: Did you see the video?

Protocol Test codec h263 from virtual videos test video long h263 lq 3gp
Instructions: Click 'GO' to play video.
Expected behaviour: Did you see the video?
